content: **crochet lil velvet pumpkin pattern by crochet for you ** i whip up a little pumpkin with some leftover velvet yarns after making sandy bobble velvet throw pillow i was inspired by all cute pumpkins out there this lil velvet pumpkin is quick and easy to crochet if you have lately worked with velvet yarns like me you may definitely have some try this pattern i hope you enjoy this pattern
